page.title: 09Newsham Grange (1)
page.content: {MR.AND MRS.PEARSON'S FARM.} We visited Newsham Grange,the home of Mr.and Mrs.Pearson.They have 89 cattle and 50 sheep.The sheep are half_bred Swaledale and the Pearsons also have two Jacob sheep.The sheep had already been shorn and looked sort of bare.The cattle are Charolais cattle and these cattle have been bred for beef.There is also a Jersey cow used for milking. When we visited the farm the Jersey cow had calved.There is a white bull too. The farm has 87 acres and the crop is mainly grass.Some hedges have been rooted out so that the tractors could work more easily.When we went to the farm Mr.Pearson was busy turning hay with a machine called a hay_turner.
